issue.title: [R] [CI] Address warnings showing up in PRs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14145](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14145). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Warnings are showing up in CI about commented code, we should address these.

For example: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11241/files

 ![image-2021-09-27-08-43-47-982.png](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/13034193/image-2021-09-27-08-43-47-982.png)
